useCase.name: Add New PPoPCode Cases to Derivation Logic

preconditions.precondition: Broker Team Member selects option to add PPoPCode cases

mainSequence.step: Broker UI sends a request to add new PPoPCode cases (00*****, 00FORGN)
Validation Rules API updates derivation rules
Derivation Logic Module integrates new PP codes into logic
Validation Rules API displays a success message
Broker UI shows confirmation of PPoPCode addition
